bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: ① Etiological Agent. of cuts by sharp edges of poisonous herbs leading to swelling, pain, and putrefaction. Tai ping sheng hui fang 太平聖惠方 68: 夫惡刺，是因毒蛇尿著草木，拂著人似刺扎，便 腫痛肉爛 , “ Malign piercing : if a poisonous snake urinates on herbs or trees, and if one is pierced by this piece, this will result in swelling, pain, and putrefaction”.

② Pathological Condition identical with e ci zhuang 惡刺瘡 , sores resulting from malign piercing. Qian jin bei ji fang 千金備急方 25: 治惡刺方：苦瓠開口，納小兒尿，煮兩三沸浸病上 , “Recipe to cure [sores resulting from] malign piercing : Take a bitter gourd, open a hole, pour a child’s urine into it. Heat until it boils two or three times, and apply to the sores”.
